articles.author: Helena Smith, Jennifer Rankin, Jon Henley, Angela Giuffrida
articles.title: Wildfires rage in Greece and Italy as EU mounts firefighting operation - The Guardian
articles.description: Week of blazes forces evacuations and brings devastating scale of destruction to large areas of southern Europe
articles.content: The devastating scale of destruction from a week of wildfires in Greece and Italy was being assessed as the EU mounted one of its largest firefighting operations ever and smoke from forest fires in S… [+6204 chars]

articles.author: Niki Kitsantonis
articles.title: Fires in Greece: The Latest - The New York Times
articles.description: Wildfires were still burning in Turkey and other parts of Europe, where a protracted heat wave has created tinderbox conditions.
articles.content: Earlier in the day, hundreds more people were evacuated by ferry from the islands northwestern coast after flames reached beaches in the area. A ferry moored on Evias northwestern coast provided temp… [+1700 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Soccer-FC Barcelona member files complaints to block any Messi move to PSG - The Star Online
articles.description: PARIS (Reuters) -     An FC Barcelona member has filed complaints with a French court and with the European Union Commission with the aim of blocking any move by Lionel Messi to Paris Saint Germain soccer club, according to documents seen by Reuters on Monday.
articles.content: PARIS (Reuters) - An FC Barcelona member has filed complaints with a French court and with the European Union Commission with the aim of blocking any move by Lionel Messi to Paris Saint Germain socce… [+1587 chars]
